<h4>Before you change this setting&#8230;</h4>
<ul>
<li>The top two options are open on the web, but you can still protect your posts with a password.</li>
<li>&#8216;Visible only to registered users of this network&#8217; includes all students and faculty in BC who are logged in to an opened.ca site.</li>
<li>&#8216;Visible only to registered users of this site&#8217; means that you will have to add users from the class who you want to see the site.</li>
<li>&#8216;Visible only to administrators of this site&#8217; means that the site is private and only you and the network administrators can see it.</li>
<li>The bottom three options, as described above, will prevent your posts from being syndicated to the course site, so please contact your instructor if you choose one of these options.</li>
</ul>
